Purpose: To measure homocysteine levels in serum for the diagnosis and monitoring of cardiovascular disease risk and vitamin B12, B6, and folate deficiencies.
Container: Plain red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Centrifuge; calibrated pipettes; automated or manual immunoassay analyzer; refrigerator (2–8 °C); freezer (−20 °C or lower)
